main.name: Venu Nalla
main.bio: I am UI Developer with experience in developing Single Page Applications and dynamic responsive Web applications with Angular 9, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, AngularJS, Angular2/4/9 and above, ReactJS, JSON and I am currently holding a position of UI developer in H&R Block. I have strong communication, planning, and problem-solving skills with the ability to work independently or with cross-functional teams.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to know more details about me.

work.title: Java UI Developer
work.description: Created and Implemented Visual Style Guides (including style sheets, templates, scripts, and coding) that shall be in accordance with the H&R Block Visual Identity and Angular for Chrysalis Microsites project. Enabled web analytics tools such as Adobe Analytics (AEM), to capture, analyze and produce reports on optimization demand. Also Contributed to Spruce which is H&R Block’s mobile banking platform to help everyone be good with their finances focusing on ReactJS. I was a part of the Virtual Submissions project, responsible for handling the Digital Drop-off (DDO) and Financial Services Product (FSP).

work.title: Java UI Developer
work.description: The project is mainly based on ACH (automated clearing house) and WIRE transfer which are payment methods involving transferring funds from one account to another. Wire transfer is done directly between a sending and receiving account, while ACH transfers use the automated clearing house as an intermediary of the sort.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: Specialty process and productivity (SPP) is a project which is redesigning Project based on legacy application SPARCS. SPARCS is the specialty pharmacy account receivable computer system. This system was designed to allow users to create and submit invoices for billing, apply payments to charges, and manage patient accounts.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: E-Payment system is a multi-tier Electronic Payment System that allows sub layers to make a payment on behalf of customer’s or establishes recurring automatic payment of the customer’s Sprint bill right from the Web. Those recurring automatic payments can only be made from customer’s credit card. Customers and sales representatives can access the data regarding the payment system.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: Responsible for creating Facebook blueprint to explore self-paced and step-by-step tutorials that can help you build your digital marketing knowledge and bring your business online using Adapt.JS. The goal of the program is to empower users with the necessary knowledge and tools to effectively promote their business online and reach a wider audience.

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: The aim of the project was to develop a web-based online application where the Internal Employees can access their account details like the account information, Commute info, punch in and punch out schedules. They can view details of current balances, account statements for a specific period of day, hour’s history, checks history, address information online.

work.title: Front End Developer / Internship
work.description: Oversaw and creating, implementing and developing new applications and Brand websites which included new interface and dynamic pages for Chico’s production website Involved in managing project in digital and e-commerce by adding transactional UI frames and  payment methods.

testimonials.text: Venu was a lead developer for a high-profile, fast-tracked IT project that involved business segments beyond our team. Venu made himself available around the clock to troubleshoot and collaborate with onshore and offshore development teams. Venu is highly capable and extremely engaging within a cross-funtional team structure; waterfall and pseudo-Agile run experience. His skillset and expertise helped me get a project from red to green and successfully released on time and budget. I highly recommend Venu!

Venu is an excellent Front End Engineer. We worked together at Wells Fargo in the same team for two years. He is extremely methodical and thorough.His grasp of various front end technologies allows him to explore a plethora of possible solutions to any given problem. His innate ability to learn and adapt to new things quickly makes him a sought-after team member !
